book.synopsis: Using Alanis, a beautiful heiress, as a pawn in his game of revenge against those who had betrayed him, the Viper, a legendary pirate, finds himself falling in love with his spirited captive as they embark on a perilous high-seas adventure. Original.
book.dimensions: Height: 6.8 Inches, Length: 4.22 Inches, Weight: 1.1 Pounds, Width: 1.16 Inches
